task.summary: Default task
new control for short text (14 chars) message display added

new control for short text (14 chars) message display added
import default user "administrator" if not already present

import default user "administrator" if not already present
Signed-off-by: Guido Drahota <guido@drahota.de>
backend: code format streamlined
backend: control-data-point service: method find() added
time scheduled external data request to OpenWeatherMap introduced
backend: bug in schema def fixed
backend: unnecessary fnc param removed
backend: cron job interval to request weather data set to 10 minutes
frontend: sorting of shown controls changed
frontend: short-text-display control: icon changed
frontend: icon changed
frontend: admin -> maintain controls -> select control: text changed
knx control to control day / night switch added
vue.config.js added
frontend: start gui dev script changed
backend: cron jobs: console logs commented out
frontend: shutter left icon color set
frontend: controls redesigned and refactored
frontend: control day-night-switch: color added to icon and switch
backend: unused code in control-system -> oplog removed
backend: ip address sanitisation added
frontend: bug in manage control system fixed
backend: console.log added in order to get more details an error shown so far
backend: console.log messages sorted oit if the collection is not defined as schema
frontend: appearance of all controls slightly changed
frontend: bug fixed in client store module
frontend: time slots control added to scheduled jobs
backend: cron jobs runner refactored + time slot scheduler implemented
backend: bug fixed: docs in knx-values will now be automatically deleted
backend: bug fixed: docs in knx-values will now be automatically deleted
backend: minimal delay between data packets send onto the knx bus doubled to 20 ms
backend: knx connection will be shutdown if the node process exits
frontend: max lux value removed from light dim control
frontend: connection status is being indicated at the app footer, after reconnect the client re-login in order to obtain fresh data
frontend: rtc control status color: turns red only if current value is true or > 1
frontend: bug fixed: no client side re-route after re-login anymore
frontend: bug fixed: no client side re-route after re-login anymore
frontend: data last updated added to footer
backend: user authentication added, login and re-login refactored
backend: data update broadcast to authorised clients limited to certain db collections
frontend + backend: manage users fully implemented
frontend + backend: manage users fully implemented
frontend + backend: manage users fully implemented
backend: bug fixed: on startup the connect promise return after the connection to the knx interface has been successfully established
backend: remove command from db AFTER the read request has been sent to the knx bus
backend: knx adapter startup refactored, all data points values are being requested at every knx adapter startup
